room_title: Escape room "Cold War: Spring of Life" by Mindscape in Atlanta
room_description:
The Year: 1985  Location:  East Berlin

A trusted source within the Russian Government has confirmed of a secret underground bunker in East Berlin that is being used as a Top Secret research facility for the Russian Government.

You are part of a Special Operations team for the CIA and your mission is to find out what the Russians are up to and exfiltrate within 60 mins.

What you find is not what you anticipated.
